text: Erechthias exospila is a species of moth in the family Tineidae. It was described by Edward Meyrick in 1901 using a specimen he collected in Whangarei in December. This species is endemic to New Zealand. ==References== ==External links== *Image of type specimen of Erechthias exospila Category:Moths described in 1901 Category:Erechthiinae Category:Moths of New Zealand Category:Endemic fauna of New Zealand Category:Taxa named by Edward Meyrick
title: Erechthias exospila
